ygData.subject: Re: Crude Stein
ygData.msgSnippet: I thought for sure I heard that it is on one of the level 40 Ogre bouncers in Feerott. Good luck to thee in thy quest! Chris aka Thunderheart Level 27 Wood-Elf
ygData.messageBody:
I thought for sure I heard that it is on one of the level 40 Ogre bouncers
in Feerott. Good luck to thee in thy quest!

Chris aka Thunderheart
Level 27
Wood-Elf
Druid
Innoruuk server
---=== Divine Wind ===---



-----Original Message-----

From: kale usi <kaleusi@...>

I've been questing for a Crude Stein for approximately 1 month now, and I've

still yet to find one. Does anyone know for sure where you can get one, or
which quest you can get them from? I'm even willing to buy one from someone
(on the Bertoxxulous server) and will discuss the price if you have one for
sale.
